entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump There seems to be a lot of COVID-19 at the White House. Maybe God isn’t pleased with what you are doing? Maybe you better find out what you are doing wrong.
